alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Thayer; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 12:05PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 3 PM CST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening and Monday morning commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
